transcript.title: UNKOWN
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER
FOR NEDIA30 JULY 1990
it is my practice whil-e overseas rnot to coment on domestic
matters. Rovever, as the proposal for a special national conference
has generated significant interest, I believe it is
appropriate to make the following comment:
I have been kept informed of this proposal. It is a serious
proposal and should be discussed within the Party. I will,
of course, be involved in those discussions when I return.
